original: Nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nasaraṇañca naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam ca na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
